title: engal kaNNammaa
sahitya:
engaL kaNNammA naghai pU rOjAppU engal kaNNammA vizhi indra nilappU
engaL kaNNammA mukham shentAmaraippU engaL kaNNammA nudal bAla sUriyan

caraNam 1

 engaL kaNNammA ezhil minnalai tErkkum engal kaNNammA puruvangaL madan virkkaL
tingaLai muDiya pAmbinaip-pOla shEri shuzhal ivan nAshi eTpU

   
caraNam 2

 mangaLa vAkku nityAnanda Utru madhura vAi amirtam idazh amirtam
sangItamen kural sarasvati vINai shAya varambai catur ayirANi

   
caraNam 3

 inkita nAda nilayam iru shevi shangu nigharnda khaNDam amirta sangam
mangaLak-kaigaL mahAshakti vAsam vayirAvilai iDai amirta vIDu

   
caraNam 4

 shankaranait-tAngu nandipada caturam tAmarai irutAL lakSmI pITham
pongit-tadumbi dishaiyengum pAyum buddhanbum jnAnamum meittirukkOlam
